name: Language Tester
description:
Test your UI in different languages.


Fund my work on Figma plugins →


Language Tester

Opens a modal with a list of languages. Select a language in the list to translate the text layers within the selection or on the current page. Close the dialog or click “Reset” to revert all text layers to their original content.


Translate

Translate the text layers within the selection or on the current page to the selected language.
